column8:
Paul Klee was a Swiss born painter who uses a great variety of color palettes from nearly monochromatic to highly polychromatic.
He had a very unique style drawn from a mix of expressionism, cubism, surrealism, futurism & orientalism!

This design shows his work "Ventriloquist", which shows a figure with a huge belly filled with beasts, an unusual piece of art which I like very much.
column21:
